meta.description: Determine the number of burgers and pizza slices to eat to minimize cholesterol intake while meeting fat and calorie requirements.

sets.name: FOODS
sets.description: Types of food available for consumption

params.name: fat_content
params.description: Fat content per unit of each food

params.name: calories
params.description: Calorie content per unit of each food

params.name: cholesterol
params.description: Cholesterol content per unit of each food

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of units of each food to consume

constraints.name: fat_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 130 units of fat are consumed

constraints.name: calorie_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 3000 calories are consumed

constraints.name: pizza_burger_ratio
constraints.description: Ensure at least twice as many slices of pizza as burgers are consumed
